entries.title: Confederate Flag - Steel-Manned Defense
entries.summary: Nuanced defense of Confederate flag as heritage symbol, acknowledging complexity while steel-manning the position.

content.position: The Confederate flag can represent Southern heritage and ancestry without endorsing slavery or racism.
steelManPoints: Many descendants honor ancestors who fought, not the institution they fought for
Historical symbols evolve in meaning (see: American flag for Native Americans)
Erasing symbols doesn't erase history - may prevent learning from it
Rural Southern identity is tied to land and lineage, not ideology
Distinction between battle flag and political Confederate flag often ignored
counterArguments: Symbol was revived specifically during Civil Rights era as intimidation
Intent of user doesn't override impact on Black Americans
Heritage argument ignores that the heritage includes slavery
content.nuancedTake: A person can honor their ancestor's courage while condemning the cause. The flag's meaning depends on context and intent, but we must acknowledge its painful associations for many Americans.

entries.title: CAET Certification Structure
entries.summary: Three-tier CAET certification system for avionics technicians.

content.overview: Developed March 2024 at AEA convention. ~90 people have taken base CAET.

CAET Base.focus: Entry-level avionics knowledge for Part 145 operations
CAET Base.data: Excel database with scores, emails, names, companies

CAET Advanced.focus: Practical skills - catch-all baseline for all shop types
creditPaths: Supervisor sign-off (must be approved CAET Advanced Trainer)
CAET Advanced.keyPrinciple: Workforce committee insists on practical qualification, not just written tests (problem with original NCAT AET and FCC GRL)

content.shopSpectrum: Basic GA (Piper 140, Cessna 172, Beechcraft + Garmin) → Business jets (Starlink installations)

entries.title: ATEC Conference 2026 - Portland

content.location: Hilton Portland Downtown, 921 SW Sixth Ave, Portland, OR 97204

nickPanel.title: Modernizing the Mechanic ACS: Proposed Revision Overview
coPanelists: Rhonda Cooper (ATEC ACS Working Group Lead)
nickPanel.topic: Competency-based training, Bloom's Taxonomy integration, risk-based framing

faaAcsUpdate.goal: Update ACS to include CAET - making basic electricity section more avionics-centric

relatedEvent.note: ATEC is right after AEA - 3 days between

entries.title: AI Council Infrastructure - Technical Reference
entries.summary: Technical reference for running parallel Clawdbot instances for AI councils.

content.architecture: Parallel Clawdbot instances - each council runs independently on its own port
content.criticalNote: Must set CLAWDBOT_GATEWAY_PORT env var - profile flag alone doesn't read port from config
content.staleLockFix: Check if PID in lock file is dead, then rm the lock file
